name: Castle Panic
description:
Boo is an adventurous slime that enjoy to explore the mysterious jungle. Until one unlucky day he falls into a buried castle underneath the jungle. Urges by his adventurous nature, he enters the castle to explore a new uncharted territory. But alas, the castle is filled with dangerous environment and traps. Help Boo to avoid and escape the castle danger safely.

Features:

Move Boo in a precise control. Jump carefully and escape the castle with the fastest time possible

Avoid many castle traps and hazard such as spikes, poison liquid, and also the slippery castle floor

Reach the exit within the time limit or else ,the castle will crumbles

Control:

A/D : Left / Right

W: Jump

A/D + Left Mouse Button : Dash

Right Mouse Button: Attract Boo to Metal Object

R: Quick Restart

Gitlab Source Code

https://gitlab.com/ezza11/castle-panic

Asset Tileset

https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-dungeon-pack
